name: Pixafy
tagline: You think it, we build it.
description:
Pixafy is a full service ecommerce agency anchored in tradition and deeply invested in the future of digital commerce. We are online retail experts that specialize in B2C and B2B implementations. Our highly experienced team with blended skill sets includes platform engineers, UI developers, designers, marketers and system architects to provide our clients digital transformation and channel harmonization across every aspect of their ecommerce universe.
As a sister company to Net@Work, a leading ERP partner of products including Sage, NetSuite, and Salesforce, we are able to leverage their core platform which includes a suite of software products, business and technology experts/specialists, and to provide more value and comprehensive solutions to our customers.
We are a Magento Enterprise (Gold) Solution Partner and Shopify Plus Partner with certified engineers on staff.
